page.title: 13REGULAR VILLAGE ACTIVITIES
page.content: Women's Institute - monthly, afternoon Men's Club - Tues & Fri evenings in Parish Rooms Recreation Club - monthly, to manage Sports Field ("Happy Meadow") Cricket Club - May-Sep matches Football Club - Sep-Apr matches Mens' Skittle Team - Sep-Apr Church Bell Ringers - practice Tues evenings, Sep-May Parochial Church Council and Village Hall Management Committee - both quarterly OCCASIONAL EVENTS include:- Coffee Mornings, Dances, Outings, Sports Evenings, 50/50 Auctions, Sales of Work, Art/Craft Exhibitions, Church Flower Festivals, and charity events (concerts, vintage car displays, etc. at Bickleigh Castle and Bickleigh Mill).
